title: Whispers in Washington
description: Do you believe in the legend of True Springs?Naomi’s life has been destroyed…When Naomi Adelman’s crooked politician husband was arrested, her life, and that of her daughters, was destroyed. Divorced and rebuilding her life, Naomi is wiser, stronger, and determined not to let anyone hurt her or her family again. Her new life doesn’t include falling for her charming and good-looking neighbor. Max bet everything and lost…Max Bruder bet his entire career on the Adelman story and lost everything. So, he figures that karma has smiled down on him when Naomi moves in next door. This is his chance to revitalize his career. Except the closer he gets to her, the deeper he falls for her. And soon, the line between interview subject and lover blurs.If they fall for each other, they may jeopardize their chance for a future.When Max’s true motive is revealed, will Naomi be able to forgive him? Fall in love with Max and Naomi in this second-chance contemporary romance.Ticket to True Love is a steamy contemporary romance series about new beginnings, second chances, and finding true love in unexpected places. Fall in love all over the world with bestselling and award-winning authors JB Schroeder, Savannah Kade, Moni Boyce, Shirley Hailstock, Holland Rae, Julie Strauss, & Jennifer Wilck. Start your next romance with Whispers in Washington now!
author: Jennifer Wilck
